title: paramEshvara pAhi
sahitya:
paramEshvara pAhi mAm shambhO vishvAdhAra para sukha rasa sAgara shrIkaNThEshvara


anupallavi

  aravinda shara madahara sundarEshvara sharadindu kalAdhara shrIkara parAtpara


caraNam    uraga nikara hAra girijA cEtOhara garala nIla kandhara karaivara carmAmbara 
sharaNAgata mandAra dEva gangAdhara varada vana tulasI vilvArcita shankara
